Class RequestBlocksHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.dao.node.lite.network.RequestBlocksHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    bisq.network.p2p.network.MessageListener

    public class RequestBlocksHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements bisq.network.p2p.network.MessageListener
    Sends a GetBsqBlocksRequest to a full node and listens on corresponding GetBsqBlocksResponse from the full node.
